Bora Bora & Tahitian Nights Explorer | Seabourn | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Bora Bora & Tahitian Nights Explorer 10 days | Papeete roundtrip US$1000 shipboard credit per suite! Deal Details Travel Dates 17, 27 Feb & 09 Mar 26 Sale Ends Dec 2, 2025 Priced From $9,599 per person Enquire Now Bonus US$1000 shipboard credit per suite! Embark your Seabourn ship for an exploration through French Polynesia’s iconic islands. Your voyage begins with serene days in the remote Tuamotu atoll of Fakarava and the vast lagoon of Rangiroa (Avatoru), where pristine coral reefs teem with marine life. From there, sail to the lush, traditional island of Huahine (Maroe Bay), followed by a stop in culturally rich Raiatea. Next, enjoy two immersive days in Bora Bora—known for its stunning lagoon, legendary overwater bungalows, and vibrant reef excursions. Then visit the striking Bahia d’Opunohu on Moorea for dramatic mountain-and-lagoon vistas before returning to Papeete. This route delivers an immersive blend of natural beauty, local traditions, and island elegance. Pricing 17 February 2026 Ocean View Suite (Cat A) from $9,599 * per person, twin share 27 February 2026 Ocean View Suite (Cat A) from $9,925* per person, twin share Veranda Suite (Cat V1) from $9,949* per person, twin share 9 March 2026 Ocean View Suite (Cat A1) from $12,465* per person, twin share Veranda Suite (Cat V1) from $12,645* per person, twin share Itinerary Ports and their order are subject to change at the discretion of the cruise line. Day 1 Embark Papeete, French Polynesia in the evening Day 2 Papeete, French Polynesia Day 3 At Sea Day 4 Fakarava, Tuamotu, French Polynesia Day 5 Avatoru, Rangiroa, French Polynesia Day 6 Maroe Bay, Huahine Iti, French Polynesia Day 7 Raiatea, Society Islands, French Polynesia Day 8 Bora Bora, French Polynesia Day 9 Bora Bora, French Polynesia Day 10 Bahia d Opunoha, Moorea, French Polynesia Day 11 Papeete, French Polynesia Day 12 Disembark the Ship in Papeete Your Ship: Seabourn Quest Terms & Conditions T&Cs: Pricing is correct as of 25 September is subject to availability and change. Cruise offer based on More Moments on us event: Up to USD$20000 for new bookings, valid for sales 02 December 2025. Valid for new bookings only. Not combinable with other offers. Supplements apply for higher suite grades, categories, and fare types. Some suites have obstructed views. *Shipboard Credit (‘Credit’) is per suite, in USD, applied to the first 2 guests in the suite only and applicable to select sailings only aligned with the More Moments on Us Event. Amount varies by suite type as specified. Oceanview and Veranda suites receive $1,000 Credit per suite, Penthouse Suites and above receive $2,000 Credit per suite. Credit expires at the conclusion of your cruise, is not transferable, not redeemable for cash and cannot be used in the casino or medical centre. Cruise itineraries and onboard offerings are not guaranteed. Charges may apply for some activities, venues and menu items. Carnival plc trading as Seabourn ABN 23 107 998 443.
